statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); display_dir="${cwd/#$HOME/~}"; branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.fileMode=false -c gc.auto=0 branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); model_id=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.id'); family=$(echo "$model_id" | sed -E 's/^claude-([^-]+).*/\1/' | awk '{print toupper(substr($0,1,1)) tolower(substr($0,2))}'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // "0"'); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then location="$display_dir ($branch)"; else location="$display_dir"; fi; printf "[%s] %s | %s | %.1f%% context" "$family" "$model_id" "$location" "$used"
